original_title: Nazi Hunter: The Beate Klarsfeld Story
overview: Beate Klarsfeld, a German Protestant housewife, who, with the help of her Jewish law-student husband, Serge, begins an unrelenting campaign after World War II to bring Nazi war criminals to justice.
tagline: During World War II, a Nazi commander engineered the deaths of thousands of Jews. Forty years later, an ordinary housewife brought him to justice.
title: Nazi Hunter: The Beate Klarsfeld Story
